item.title: How use github as host of your website ?
item.description: Hello World! In this post , I explain how use github as host of your website. if you use hugo as static site generator only thing is need to do is following step: 1.run hugo 2.creat github repo as following format : your_github_user_name.github.io 3.copy public directory of your hugo site in your_github_user_name.github.io 4.now your site is ready. address of your site is : your_github_user_name.
